$description:
| What does this do? | Enables Safe Attachments in the tenant to protect against email-based attacks. |
| Why should you use this? | Protects users from malware in email attachments by detonating any attachments in a sandbox before releasing the message. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Some delay in delivery of email with attachments may be observed. |
| Learn more | [Safe attachments policies](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/security/office-365-security/safe-attachments-policies-configure?view=o365-worldwide) |
